summary: "Tulsa King" is a TV show on Paramount+ about a Mafia boss, Dwight Manfredi (played by Sylvester Stallone), who starts a new criminal group in Tulsa, Oklahoma, after getting out of prison. The show has comedy and crime, and it's popular, with a second season already made. Critics like Stallone's acting, but some don't love the story. It's helped Paramount+ get more viewers and subscribers.
title: Tulsa King
